Judas... man... is there some way we can donate money for you? Seriously, your rips are awesome!

Other rippers claim their rips have the same quality a 20GB file have but that's bullshit. Now, your files... man, I've encoded lots of videos before and I have no idea how you get this size without any major quality loss. No weird stuff in action scenes, no excessive blocks in still shots... seriously, I have no idea on how you do this, but I like it and I think you should accept some donations from us

i'm still here don't worry....

I've just been a wee bit busy with genereal life things..

plus it's hard to keep up on everything. I would say on average it was working out to about 2-4 hours worth of my own time personally that was being consumed in managing encoding and uploading.... (obviously excluding time I didn't have to be at the machine... such as seeding and letting the computer do the encoding itself)

Sometimes one needs a little bit of a break.
Take a well deserved break! Its not like you get paid for this haha!
